Poshi Tutorial¶

Welcome to Poshi Tutorial! Thank you for your interest in learning Poshi.

Need immediate help?
  • Reach someone on the LRQA Slack channel;
  • Ask a Poshi-specific question, on the Poshi Slack channel; or,
  • Refer to the current documentation on our Github Repo.

Introduction¶

Testing a Web-based Platform
Overview of Selenium WebDriver and Page Object Models.
Poshi Advantage
Extending WebDriver, page objects made easy and simplifying syntax.
Poshi Layers
Poshi is like an onion. Onions have layers. Poshi has layers too.
Liferay Functional Testing
Test execution, Continuous Integration with Jenkins/Github, and Continuous Results with Testray/Spira.
